description:
Abductions abound!  Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Jonouchi and Anzu! To make matters worse, the Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Mask of Light and Mask of Darkness on top of a skyscraper!  The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Curse of the Mask: Skyscraper Duel
Kamen no Jubaku Kousou no Duel
仮面の呪縛 高層のデュエル
